item.title: The Classics EP 12: Solar Plexus Clown Gliders
item.itunes:title: The Classics: Solar Plexus Clown Gliders
item.description:
Breaking news regarding the solar observatory shutdown, students riot over a statue, and then we go into the depths of space to investigate Solar Plexus Clown Gliders.

Apparently, the reason why the Sunspot Solar Observatory in New Mexico was shut down was because a janitor was trading child porn and then making threats after his operation was discovered. Is this the real reason or is it simply disinformation?

Then we travel to jolly ole England and the year 1907, where a group of medical students waged war to tear down a statue . . .of a dog.

Finally, we investigate the rumor that Solar Plexus Clown Gliders are interdimensional demons bent on multiverse conquest. And I may have seen one before.

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

 

Links:

 

New Mexico solar observatory: A child pornography investigation, not aliens, triggered the mysterious closure of the facility

https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/morning-mix/wp/2018/09/20/new-mexico-solar-observatory-a-child-pornography-investigation-not-aliens-triggered-the-mysterious-closure-of-the-facility/?noredirect=on&utm_term=.9bdaaef762c4

 

WERE SPACE AND SOLAR OBSERVATORIES SHUT DOWN AT THE SAME TIME AROUND THE WORLD THIS WEEK?

https://www.dailygrail.com/2018/09/were-space-and-solar-observatories-shut-down-at-the-same-time-around-the-world-this-week/

 

Solar Observatories Across the Planet Being Shutdown. What Are They Hiding?

https://perc360.com/solar-observatories-across-the-planet-being-shutdown-what-are-they-hiding-360/

Breaking news regarding the solar observatory shutdown, students riot over a statue, and then we go into the depths of space to investigate Solar Plexus Clown Gliders.

Apparently, the reason why the Sunspot Solar Observatory in New Mexico was shut down was because a janitor was trading child porn and then making threats after his operation was discovered. Is this the real reason or is it simply disinformation?

Then we travel to jolly ole England and the year 1907, where a group of medical students waged war to tear down a statue . . .of a dog.

Finally, we investigate the rumor that Solar Plexus Clown Gliders are interdimensional demons bent on multiverse conquest. And I may have seen one before.
